Alpaca Generator

Web project

This is a personal project. In order to fill my portfolio I was inspired by this project on Codementor.io.

I did this project with the goal of improving my front-end skills. After starting the basic structure of the project I asked myself the question: "how to generate all these buttons?

For the space of 30 seconds I imagined myself typing them in raw HTML with lots of different

One of my sub-goals was not to use a framework (like Vue.JS for example). This allowed me to mobilize my knowledge of DOM manipulation with Javascript.

Using a second JS file where I wrote all the image resources of the project, I was able to create an iteration to create all the elements of the page in a more dynamic way.

Still using this iterative system, I was able to associate all the listeners necessary for the application to work.

To merge the images into one and to be able to download it, I used the code of the merge-images library.
